name: Neon Race Raves
description:
You're trapped in a neon rave, everyone is chasing you!! You must live, no matter what... Let the race BEGIN!!

*** IMPORTANT NOTE ***

The build from itch.io is not fully operational, as is it not loading some resources. Please, check this build instead: https://neon-race-raves-7mxrwg7r6-anthonypereira-uapt.vercel.app/

** BEFORE ENTERING **

Update the Auto-play policy so that the last resources (background audio and video) are rendered:

- Go to Google Chrome's Properties Panel, and under the Target option, add this statement after the default one: --autoplay-policy=no-user-gesture-required 

- Then, apply the change you made.

Now, you must close all Chrome windows and execute it as an admin.

ENJOY :)

* FINAL NOTE *

This game was developed using an Ubuntu distribution, so be aware that some rendering differences may exist.
